value.0:
This tool enables a DM to copy and paste a group of placeables or a singulare plc. Mind that it creates placeables from the palette, and it should therefore only be used on a group you created from the DM Chooser.

Function 1: 
-create a group of max 30 placeables-
* click in the center of the group
* give the widget to a PC as a DC item
* the PC can use it to spawn the group now

Function 2:
-create copy of a sinle plc-
* Set the variable: " ##SetVarInt plcs_allowed x "where x is the number of times the pc can spawn the plc max.
* click on/near the desired plc
* give the widget to a PC as a DC item
* the PC can use it to spawn the plc as often as the set variable allows.
* as player use on yourself to despawn all spawned plcs fromthis widget

If you  make an error you can clean the widget by clicking on yourself. This only works if you are a DM. Upon selecting a group of PLCs the name of the widget changes to show it's been set.

NOTE: this item works from your DM avatar AS LONG AS YOU DON'T LOGOUT!
